Name: Modern Warfighter Optics
Description:
A collection of modern collimator optics meant for contemporary weapon systems in various sizes, shapes, and colors.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CONTENTS

- Aimpoint CompM5 (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Aimpoint ACO (Straight, Cantilever, and Low mounts)
- Aimpoint T2 (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Aimpoint CompM4s
- Aimpoint ACRO (Low and High mounts)
- Eotech EXPS3 (Green and Red reticles)
- EoTech G33 Magnifier
- SIG Romeo1 (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- SIG Romeo3 (Low and High mounts)
- SIG Romeo4T (Low and High mounts in Black and FDE)
- DOCTER SightIII (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Trijicon MRO
- Trijicon RMR (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Trijicon SRO (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Trijicon ACOG TA02
- Vortex Venom
- Vortex StrikefireII
- Vortex Crossfire
- Vortex UH-1 Huey Gen III
- Leupold DeltaPoint (Offset, Low, and High mounts)

CURRENT ISSUES

Red dots get smaller at farther distances, and cannot be zeroed - this is an issue based on the shader I have available for use as of this moment, unfortunately.

Magnified optics causes sound to pick up off of the optic itself, instead of your viewmodel - this is a nonissue if you don't leave a weapon with a magnifier behind, and the issue disappears if the optic is destroyed.
